description: Returns the shared directories in your account.

parameters.name: OwnerDirectoryId
parameters.description: Returns the identifier of the directory in the directory owner account.

parameters.name: SharedDirectoryIds
parameters.description: A list of identifiers of all shared directories in your account. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SharedDirectories
nested_items.description: A list of all shared directories in your account.

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the directory owner account, which contains the directory that has been shared to the consumer account.

nested_items.name: OwnerDirectoryId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the directory in the directory owner account.

nested_items.name: ShareMethod
nested_items.description: The method used when sharing a directory to determine whether the directory should be shared within your Amazon Web Services organization ( ORGANIZATIONS) or with any Amazon Web Services account by sending a shared directory request ( HANDSHAKE).

nested_items.name: SharedAccountId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the directory consumer account that has access to the shared directory ( OwnerDirectoryId) in the directory owner account.

nested_items.name: SharedDirectoryId
nested_items.description: Identifier of the shared directory in the directory consumer account. This identifier is different for each directory owner account.

nested_items.name: ShareStatus
nested_items.description: Current directory status of the shared Managed Microsoft AD directory.

nested_items.name: ShareNotes
nested_items.description: A directory share request that is sent by the directory owner to the directory consumer. The request includes a typed message to help the directory consumer administrator determine whether to approve or reject the share invitation.

nested_items.name: CreatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the shared directory was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the shared directory was last updated.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If not null, token that indicates that more results are available. Pass this value for the NextToken parameter in a subsequent call to  DescribeSharedDirectories to retrieve the next set of items.
